title: AIRI
author: Neko Ayaka
excerpt: Self hosted, you owned AI companion, a container of souls of waifu, cyber livings to bring them into our worlds, wishing to achieve Neuro-sama's altitude. Capable of realtime voice chat, Minecraft, Factorio playing. Open source alternative to Grok Companion.
text: Self hosted, you owned AI companion, a container of souls of waifu, cyber livings to bring them into our worlds, wishing to achieve Neuro-sama's altitude. Capable of realtime voice chat, Minecraft, Factorio playing. Open source alternative to Grok Companion.
